High Priest Maximilian:

Go to the Death Pass. There you must hunt Wyrms, Guardian Basilisks, Road Scavengers, Fettered Souls, Windsus and Grandis.

These monsters constantly emanate the energy of death, so we just can't let them be.

The Death Pass is not far from here. You can go there by foot if you want, but you can also use a teleport.

Go to Giran's Gatekeeper and find the Death Pass in her teleport list. Easy, eh?
